weekly_top_story.headline: FDA Revokes Emergency Use Authorizations for COVID-19 Vaccines, Changing Access Guidelines
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA rescinded the EUAs for COVID-19 vaccines, limiting broad access and requiring medical consultation for off-label vaccination among younger, healthy individuals, marking a significant shift in pandemic-era vaccine policy.

stories.headline: HHS Cancels mRNA Vaccine Development Activities Under BARDA
stories.summary: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services terminated its mRNA vaccine development efforts under BARDA, signaling a strategic shift in federal vaccine innovation priorities.

stories.headline: Surge in Poison Control Calls Related to Self-Harm Among Preteens
stories.summary: Data reveals a 311% increase in poison center calls linked to suspected self-harm or suicidal intent in children aged 6 to 12 over two decades, highlighting urgent pediatric mental health concerns.

stories.headline: CMS Launches Rural Health Transformation Program Website Ahead of September Applications
stories.summary: CMS unveiled its Rural Health Transformation Program website to improve rural healthcare quality, with program applications and introductory webinars scheduled for later this month.
